page.title: 07LLOYD'S BANK TRAINING BRANCH
page.content: THE ECONOMIC INSTITUTION OF LLOYD'S BANK HAS ITS TRAINING BRANCH IN HINDHEAD.THE PROPERTY USED TO BE AN OLD COUNTRY HOTEL BEFORE LLOYD'S PURCHASED IT. THEY CHOSE THIS AREA IN WHICH TO BASE THE TRAINING CENTRE BECAUSE IT IS QUITE NEAR TO LONDON, BUT GENERALLY QUIET, WITH A LARGE AREA OF LAND AVAILABLE FOR EXPANSION. THE CENTRE HAS BEEN HERE SINCE 195O, DURING THIS TIME THEY HAVE BOUGHT ADJACENT AREAS OF LAND SO THAT THE ENTIRE SITE NOW TOTALS 24 ACRES. THE BANK CONSISTS OF THE MAIN BUILDINGS FOR THE TRAINING OF THE STUDENTS AND A RESIDENTIAL BUILDING. THE BLOCKS AT THE MOMENT ACCOMMODATE 14O STUDENTS AND IO FULL-TIME STAFF.MOST OF THE COURSES ARE OF 2-3 MONTHS DURATION, THE SHORTEST COURSE LASTS FOR FIVE DAYS.I4O STAFF, SOME PART-TIME ARE EMPLOYED HERE.
